info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 25 at 1:39PM CDT until May 29 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...
Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County.
Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County.
For the Little Osage River...including Horton...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sac River...including Caplinger Mills...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little Osage River near Horton.
* WHEN...Until Thursday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 45.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs at the gage site. Low lying areas along Route D near Stotesbury flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 41.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 41.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM CDT Sunday was 41.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.6 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 43.6 feet on 12/16/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 145 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING
